sentences.sContent: Past experience shows that quarantine measures and embargoes on the movement of people and goods are unnecessary.
sentences.sContent_eng: Past experience shows that quarantine measures and embargoes on the movement of people and goods are unnecessary.
sentences.sCn: 以往的经验表明，不必要采取检疫措施并对人员和货物流动加以禁止。

phrases.pCn: 检疫所；卫生检疫所；检疫站

remMethod.val: quarant (四十) + ine → 检疫期要隔开40天 → 检疫期

trans.tranOther: a period of time when a person or animal is kept apart from others in case they are carrying a disease
